english.segment1: I'm filled with joy joy joy. unspeakable joy. when I talk to Father God. unspeakable joy. He gives me food along with drink. unspeakable joy. He has my heart, body and soul. unspeakable joy
english.segment2: chorus. I'm singing for joy for what I have won. a brand new life beginning in You. I've got to thank Him for what He has done. praise Him for what He will do
english.segment3: I'm talking about joy joy joy. unspeakable joy. hands up in the SPirit. unspeakable joy. oh, glory to the Father. unspeakable joy. to his only Son. unspekable joy
english.segment4: repeat chorus. so you want joy joy joy. unspeakable joy. then give your heart to Jesus. unspeakable joy. d-d-d-d-d-dance. unspeakable joy. everybody sing, sing, sing. unspeakable joy
